name: RPMTW Platform Mod
description:
整合了 RPMTW 各項服務的模組，涵蓋了翻譯、百科、宇宙通訊、中文輸入優化等功能，期望能讓 Minecraft 中文玩家獲得更好的體驗。
The mod that integrates various services of RPMTW covers translation, wiki, cosmic chat, Chinese input optimization, and other functions, hoping to make Minecraft Chinese players get a better experience.
